medium: Etching and aquatint on both sides of a sheet of laid paper
title: Double-sided Portrait of Mademoiselle Eva Gonzalès
marks:
Inscription and Stamp

recto, bottom center, in
description: two-sided print with same image on each side--slightly more detail on side with stamp and inscription; seated woman at an easel, holding palette, brushes and maul stick, at work on a framed painting; large flower on floor, LRC; woman wears white gown with dark waist sash; dark curly hair
creditline: Gift of Eric G. Carlson in memory of Edith Garmezy
